The interpretation of seeing a bee sting in a dream for a single girl. Seeing bees in an unmarried girl’s dream means marriage soon, God willing. Especially if she gets married That bee is her home. This vision is a good omen that he will marry someone he loves. It can indicate her success, the fulfillment of her hopes and aspirations, and her ability to prove herself to others. This vision may indicate the good morals of this girl. Its wonderful and unique recipes. In general, bees in a woman’s dream may symbolize her beauty and goodness. An unmarried girl seeing in her dream that she is drinking white honey. They are jealous of her relationship with her husband and want to destroy her home. They are planning To the intrigues and adventures in an attempt to separate her from her husband. Interpretation of seeing bees in a married woman’s dream, and she is surrounded by bees, but she could not get rid of them and kill them. This is an indication that she is a woman who listens to advice, benefits from it, and then puts it into practice. The vision of a married woman

title: The most important interpretations of cutting a beard in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Cutting the beard in a dream is one of the traditional things that one can see, but you see what is the hidden meaning behind it, and this question comes to the minds of many because of its strangeness, especially if the dreamer has shaved it off completely and is very proud of it. You are in this topic. Cutting the beard in a dream. Many jurists and interpreters have indicated that cutting the beard in a dream is one of the matters that carries many interpretations and distinct connotations for dreamers, which is confirmed by the presence of many positive interpretations that we will present below. If a person sees in a dream that he is shaving and trimming his beard This symbolizes that he is a pure man and has a character that makes his life full of gifts and blessings, in addition to the many blessings in which he will live. In the following days, he will receive a reward for his high morals and good relations with people. While a young man who sees in his dream that he is shaving his beard and wakes up from his sleep in a state of great comfort, this indicates that he is repenting for the sins he committed in his life in addition to being cleansed of all. Desires and sins. It was committed in the past. Cutting the beard in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin pointed out that trimming the beard in a man’s dream, even to a small amount, indicates his response to all the debts that burdened him and burdened him greatly, and he spent the night trying to find the appropriate solution to pay what he owed. He is in debt. While the woman who sees in her dream that she is plucking her chin explains this by obtaining her desire in life after many efforts that cannot be underestimated in any way, which will make her very happy and make her realize that her work was not in it. In vain.While a man who shaves his beard gives his vision that he is a person who is not firm in his principles and is willing to give up his values ​​to get something he desires.Secrets of Dream InterpretationThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, type a page on the Internet Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams on Google. Reducing the beard in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi explains the vision of shaving the beard in a dream with many distinct interpretations that we mention. If a person sees in his dream that his beard is trimmed, it symbolizes that he will face many special things in his life in addition to change. . His circumstances are for the better in a way he does not expect at all. While a woman who sees in her dream that her husband cuts his beard but accidentally cuts himself, this symbolizes that he will suffer from many problems in his life, which will reflect on his livelihood and turn her stability into great tension. Dealing with him will not be an easy task at all, as he is expected to do things that require a lot of focus and wisdom in dealing with him. Reducing the beard in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she has a beard and cuts it or removes it, and this vision indicates that she will marry a good-looking young man. He is beautiful in appearance and proposes to her officially. She must think carefully and set her priorities in life before involving him in future and deadly matters. While a girl who sees in her dream that her father is cutting his beard indicates that she will get rid of worries.

title: The 5 most famous interpretations of seeing dirt in a dream

preview.html: Meaning Seeing someone cleaning the house? Means canceling the engagement. What is the interpretation of removing dirt from the wall? This means instability in her emotional life. Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream: A patient digging the ground in a dream means that his death is near, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin interpreted filth to the traveler as what he earns from Money. Seeing dirt for a woman means the money she will take in her life. Walking in the dirt means that you are a person seeking to earn money. The evil of seeing dirt in a dream. Ibn Sirin said: If he sees that he is removing dirt from his hands: it is a bad vision. If he removes dirt from his clothes or hands, then this It means that the money he earned will disappear and expire. A trader who earns a lot of money from his trading will lose it and be in debt and borrow from people. Dirt in a married woman’s dream. Dirt means people, and it also means affection and affirmation with her husband. If she is suffering from financial problems, then dirt means a lot Of the money that her husband gets. Dirt indicates an inheritance, which means that he will inherit a lot of money soon. Dirt does not only indicate the provision of money, but it can mean blessing and goodness in her life. Interpretation of a dream about dirt for a pregnant woman: Seeing dirt for a pregnant woman is interpreted in three Pictures, the first picture is a vision of her walking on the dirt, and this means that she will not be harmed or hurt during childbirth, and the second picture, if she removed the dirt from her house, then this is evidence that she overcame the pain of childbirth. While the third picture is when you see her eating dirt, this is a clear indication However, her new baby is male. The dream of dust is for single women. As for a virgin who is not married, it is a source of livelihood. If she sees dirt, she may have a marriage or a job. It means the fulfillment of desires and success. If a girl dreams that her clothes contain a large amount of dust, this means that she will get married soon. If she cleans the house, this means that the engagement has been broken. Removing dirt from the wall means instability in her love life. Interpretation of a dream about soft dirt. Soft dirt in a dream covered the patient’s entire body. This is a very clear sign that this person is not recovering and that his death is imminent. As for dreaming of a dust storm It means that you are making a lot of effort, but in projects that have no value or benefit. If he sees dirt as if it has completely turned golden or has become golden, this is a vision of evil, because dirt that turns into gold means illness; Because its color is yellow, or quarrels start with the family and wife, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of dreams about hatching duck eggs

preview.html: She will have a lot of satisfaction and kindness in the coming days and we will show you many explanations from the interpreter, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing duck eggs hatching in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that duck eggs are hatching. This dream indicates that this girl will meet someone by chance, and he will love her and propose to her soon. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that eggs are hatching, she was not optimistic. This dream indicates that this girl will be exposed to many difficult circumstances in her life and will not be able to bear them. She will go through a difficult psychological state as a result of the anxiety she faces. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that duck eggs are hatching, but everything inside is dead. This vision indicates that this girl will separate from her fiancé. He did not complete the engagement period and there will be problems that lead to separation between them. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that it is difficult to hatch egg whites. This dream indicates that this girl could not succeed in her life. And that she failed and could not get rid of everything that was preventing her. While if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that duck eggs are unclean And hatching. This vision indicates that this girl is immoral and that her reputation is not good among people. She does not like to give good and has a character of selfishness and self-love. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is doing this alone, then duck eggs will hatch. This dream indicates that she is struggling and trying to achieve her goals and will achieve all goals in the coming days. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that ducks hatch from eggs and break. This dream indicates that there are people in her life who do not want to communicate with her and do not love her well. It also indicates that she needs to take care of them and take care of them and it is possible that they are among those close to her and do not feel that. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that duck eggs are hatching and inside there is a chick about to die. This vision shows that this girl will fall ill from an illness, but this illness was not serious and she will recover from it soon. See also: Interpretation of a dream about ducks for a single woman, a married woman and a man Interpretation of seeing duck eggs hatching in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that duck eggs are hatching, and ducklings come out of them, and that woman takes care of them And feeding them. This dream indicates that this woman is obedient to her husband and loves good for people and cares about the cleanliness of her home and lives a satisfying and simple life with her husband. When a married woman sees in her dream that duck eggs hatch easily, their appearance and color were wonderful. This dream shows that this woman cares about herself and her husband and loves to understand him. While if a married woman sees ducks hatching from eggs in her dream, that duck was also sick. This dream indicates that this woman will get tired in her life and will face a serious illness and will not recover from it easily. If a married woman sees a duck in her dream, and it hatches chicks of an attractive color. This vision indicates that this woman will hear good news about her, either the news of pregnancy. Or her husband finding a job opportunity abroad or moving from one house to another. If

title: Interpretation of long hair in a dream and cutting long hair in a dream

preview.html: Seeing long hair in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man cutting long hair. I dreamed that my hair was getting longer according to Ibn Sirin by Imam Al-Sadiq. Dreaming about long hair is one of the interpretations that causes anxiety for many people if they see it in a dream, which indicates many meanings. It may portend good or bad news to the dreamer. There is no doubt that the vision means a lot to us in our lives, so when one sees any vision in his dream, he searches online for its correct and accurate interpretation. This report was presented to you by the greatest scholars and translators of Arabic dreams. In general, long hair is an important issue for many men and women around the world and it is the ultimate symbol of beauty that many people search for attractive hair. Interpretation of a dream about long hair in a dream According to experts who interpret dreams, it is said that Long hair in a dream, if a pregnant woman sees it, indicates the birth of a girl, but long hair in general is interpreted as an abundance of money and a long life. Whoever sees in his dream that the hair on his head is long, his life will be long. If long hair is coiled in a dream, this indicates the dreamer accumulating debts. If a woman sees long hair in a dream and her hair is not like that, then this is a bad sign and symbolizes a lot of worry, sadness and pain. As for cutting hair in a dream, it symbolizes getting rid of worries. Interpretation of long hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a rich man with long hair in a dream means that his wealth It will increase as his business grows. Seeing a poor man with long hair in a dream means that you have borrowed money to pay his debts and daily expenses. If you see long spiral hair in a dream, it means that you will receive honor in your career. Seeing long hair of abnormal size in a dream means That you will lose the money you have earned. Seeing a sick woman with long hair in a dream means that she will die from illness. Seeing long hair in a dream while feeling anxious means increasing misfortunes that cause anxiety and dissatisfaction. Seeing long hair under the armpit means that a goal will be achieved and It indicates a generous personality. Seeing long and thick hair in a dream indicates desire and thirst for knowledge and the desire to search for work. Seeing long chest hair in a dream is evidence of wisdom, clarity, and diligence, and in the case of abnormal hair, this indicates adversity and tension. Seeing nose hair Long hair in a dream indicates the end of some hidden problems facing an unmarried woman, which indicates marriage, while for a married woman, it indicates taking care of children. Seeing a child’s long hair in a dream indicates his long life. Changing the color of long black hair to white in a dream indicates loss of money for For a rich person and in the event that a poor person pays his debts. Seeing long blond hair in a dream means loyalty to friends. Whoever sees that his hair is long, this is considered a desirable thing, especially for women, and braided hair indicates religion. Seeing a soldier with long hair in a dream indicates increased armament. Seeing long hair of a worried person in a dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of cucumber in a dream and eating cucumber in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed of cucumbers for single women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, where we will explain that I pick cucumbers, cut cucumbers, eat cucumbers, give cucumbers to the dead, dream of tomatoes and pickled cucumbers, and see bananas and cucumbers according to Ibn Sirin, but the interpretation of cucumbers in a dream. Cucumbers are anxiety and sadness in a dream, So whoever eats it will try to do something that will burden him. The time has come for sustenance and there is no time for illness. If he sees him standing, he will be born sad, and whoever sees that he is eating her while she is pregnant, he will be born a slave. Cucumber, if cut with iron, is good for diseases. And the choice continues to improve for those who apply. See also wages, and see Qadha. Ibn Sirin said in his book (Interpretation of Great Dreams): Cucumbers in a dream are anxiety and sadness, so whoever sees them is like eating them, then he is struggling in a matter that entails hardship or exhaustion, especially yellow ones from illness. If the dreamer gets married and his wife is pregnant and sees in the dream He eats cucumbers, so his wife has the right to give birth to a child. Some interpreters said: It is praiseworthy in the interpretation that the sleeper sees as if he is cutting the cucumbers with a knife, so this is good for the sick and injured. As for Al-Nabulsi, he referred to cucumbers in his book (Ta’tir Al-Anam fi Interpretation of a Dream), where he said: Cucumbers are good. It is better for those who see it in a dream or see it as if you were yourself. Buy it, eat it, or even grow or harvest it, and green cucumbers in its interpretation are better than yellow ones. Seeing cucumbers in a dream brings anxiety and sadness to the dreamer, because it symbolizes problems and hardships. Whoever dreams in a dream that he is eating cucumbers, this indicates heavy burdens and many fears that will burden him. Whoever sees That he eats cucumbers while they are in season, this indicates the abundance of food and goodness that he will receive. If one dreams of eating cucumbers out of season, this means that he will become seriously ill and may suffer a great loss. Whoever sees in a dream that he is cutting cucumbers into small pieces This indicates his recovery if he is sick, profit if he is a merchant, and victory if he is under trial. Whoever dreams that he sees a green cucumber in his dream, this indicates goodness and justice in the course of his life. Whoever dreams that he sees a yellow cucumber, this indicates great fatigue and efforts. The many efforts that he will make to achieve success. Whoever dreams of pickled cucumbers, this is an indication of the gossip that surrounds him and that targets his reputation and the reputation of his family. In the event that the dreamer becomes pregnant, this symbolizes comfort and the resolution of disputes between her and her husband. Although cucumber is a useful and popular fruit for many, seeing it in The dream indicates sadness and a feeling of distress and that this dream will cause troubles and troubles in the future. But if cucumbers are seen in a dream at the time of their season, this is evidence of abundant goodness that will be easy for the dreamer. But seeing them out of season will be evidence of illness, and the man who grew up eating Cucumber in a dream, his wife will give birth to a girl if she is pregnant at that time. title: Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for a single woman: Menstrual blood is bad blood that comes out of a woman, and seeing menstruation in a dream can be a sign of success, distinction, and the fulfillment of desires, and at other times it can mean hearing some bad news, and this varies depending on the dreamer. The condition of menstruation and ablution for an unmarried girl. To learn more, follow this article. Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for a single woman. When a girl sees menstrual blood in a dream, this is a sign that she will put an end to the anxiety that she has been dealing with for a long time. A girl who sees menstrual blood in a dream indicates It indicates that she will move to a new job or place and begin a happy life. A girl’s dream of menstrual blood could be a sign that there is a person who loves one girl and is engaged to her, agrees with him and can spend a happy life with him. If the dreamer sees menstrual blood in the dream, this can symbolize Going through difficult times peacefully and that you will be free from aches and pains. Interpretation of dreams about menstrual blood and it comes out a lot for a girl, this could be a sign that she will take on a new project and succeed in it and earn a lot of halal money. Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that blood Menstruation for an unmarried girl could be a sign that she is committing sins and doing forbidden things and she must repent to God for this. Menstrual blood for a girl may indicate the arrival of goodness, happiness, and abundance of sustenance, and the interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood in a dream for a girl may indicate that she has reached puberty or puberty. She will become a mature and wise girl. When an unmarried woman sees menstrual blood in a dream and feels worried about it, this is a sign of her anxiety and fear that her period will not occur. Dreaming of menstruation in a dream can mean that the unmarried girl will move to a new job, and this will be better for her What is the interpretation of menstrual bleeding in a dream for an unmarried woman? If an unmarried girl sees that her period came at an inappropriate time, this may be a sign that she will go down the wrong path and make unacceptable decisions, and she must be careful and think with her mind. Menstrual bleeding may indicate... The dream indicates a change in the girl’s condition for the better, and the interpretation of menstrual bleeding for her may be a sign that her relationship is imminent. When a girl sees heavy menstrual blood in a dream, it can be interpreted that she is suffering from an illness and will be cured soon, and it is possible that seeing blood in a dream means that The girl will discover the deceit and lies of the people closest to her. The symbol of menstruation in a dream is good news for a single woman. Menstruation in a dream can be good news for the girl and a sign of legitimate acquisition, livelihood and blessing in money. The symbol of menstruation can be a sign that she is in a big problem and he will find a solution for it and will get on him. Get rid of it eventually. If a girl is engaged and sees menstruation in a dream, this indicates that her marriage will be completed on good terms. Certainly, menstrual blood in an unmarried woman’s dream can be a harbinger of achieving goals and ambitions that she has not aspired to recently. Menstrual blood is also a sign of

title: Interpretation of mint in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of mint in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Mint is a green herbaceous plant that has a beautiful smell. It is added to tea and is included in the ingredients of many foods, because of its great importance, especially for Arabs, in addition to its aesthetic and aromatic uses. Some people may dream of seeing mint in their sleep and are confused about its interpretation. Is it good or bad, and for this reason we encyclopedia of all the details related to seeing mint in a dream, according to dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of mint in a dream by Ibn Sirin. According to what the scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin said about seeing mint in a dream, we mention the following: Ibn Sirin believes that all vegetables Herbal mint in a dream with an aromatic smell represents good news and blessings. Buying mint in a dream indicates the prestigious position that the dreamer will gain by God’s command, which will bring him many good things. Yellow mint in a dream, unlike green mint, indicates loss and misfortunes that will befall The seer. Planting green mint in a dream indicates meeting a person who admires God or the beautiful girl whom the fortuneteller will marry. Drinking mint in a dream indicates the company of good friends. Interpretation of seeing mint in a dream for a single woman. There are many indications that a single woman sees mint in a dream. We will mention them. In the following points: Mint indicates good luck and abundant food. Mint in a girl’s dream symbolizes long life and good health by the command of God Almighty. Drinking mint or inhaling it and its pungent smell indicates the great happiness that the dreamer will obtain in the afterlife. Picking mint in a woman’s dream For an unmarried woman, it is a sign of success and distinction in her academic and professional life. Mint in a dream for a married woman. The following is the interpretation of a married woman who sees mint in a dream: Seeing a married woman using mint to prepare food symbolizes blessings in her home and good health for her and her family. It indicates saving money and cleanliness. Good. Seeing mint in a married woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of the desire that God called for a period, which may be Umrah or Hajj. Fumigating the house with mint indicates that it is full of good news and happy occasions. Mint in a pregnant woman’s dream. Dream interpretation scholars interpreted a pregnant woman’s dream of mint as Next: Seeing a pregnant woman with mint in a dream indicates the possibility that her pregnancy was from a woman, and only God Almighty knows what is in the wombs. Picking mint for a pregnant woman in a dream is good news about the ease of childbirth and adequate nutrition for her and her fetus by God’s command. Interpretation of mint Dried mint in a dream symbolizes saved money and God’s blessing in blessings, food, and gifts. While wilted mint indicates laziness, neglect, failure in practical life, and the inability to achieve goals. Yellow mint in a dream indicates a serious illness and sad news. Interpretation of a dream about mint for the dead. This vision is one of the good visions that The viewer is satisfied with it, and we separate it as follows: The dreamer’s vision of

title: A detailed interpretation of suicide in a dream

preview.html: Today we share with you the meanings and meanings of seeing suicide in a dream, which is one of the visions that carries with it many meanings that make the dreamer feel afraid, anxious, and confused. What contradicts what is supported by religions and public morals in all countries, so what does this dream symbolize and is it considered a praiseworthy vision or a vision that does not bode well? Suicide in a dream Interpretation scholars have worked hard to explain the meanings and symbols that suicide in a dream carries through interpretation books. Therefore, through the following lines, we present the most prominent interpretations of these visions from the point of view of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of suicide in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The dream of many people committing suicide in a city symbolizes the spread of disease or disaster in lives and money in that city. Seeing the poor killing themselves in a dream It means that the abundance of sustenance, kindness, and abundance of halal food is pouring down on them, in addition to the goodness that accompanies one’s path in this world and the hereafter. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that one of his relatives commits suicide, this symbolizes the strength of the relationship between them. Seeing a rich person killing himself in a dream means loss of money and poverty. Because he is rich, and God knows best. Interpretation of suicide in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Suicide in a dream symbolizes the dreamer who has not died, so it indicates that the dreamer will get married soon, and God knows best. Dreaming about suicide in a dream indicates poverty, need, and trials that befall the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Ibn Shaheen points out Until seeing a prisoner kill himself, indicates that God will release all of him soon. Seeing suicide in a dream and washing the body indicates that this person is blessed by God with all goodness in this world and the hereafter. And seeing a man dying and being buried, symbolizes that he will get married soon, or He will recover if he is sick. If a girl sees that she is killing herself in a dream, this indicates the delay in her marriage, and God knows best. Seeing dead people resurrected from their graves indicates high values. As for someone who sees in his dream that he lived after committing suicide? This indicates that God Almighty forgives his sins and enriches him with his courage. The dream of a friend committing suicide symbolizes that this friend is characterized by betrayal or that God Almighty will afflict him with calamities. Interpretation of a dream about a woman committing suicide. The interpretations that came from seeing a woman killing herself in a dream are varied. In dream interpretation books, there are different meanings. We explain it as follows: Scholars and interpreters believe that a woman’s suicide in a dream symbolizes repentance. But if this vision comes of committing suicide openly in front of creation; It indicates the curbing of her desires and her repentance to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about my husband who committed suicide. The wife feels intense fear for her husband if she sees her husband killing himself in a dream. What does this vision symbolize? We learn about these symbols and the connotations that this vision carries as follows: Seeing a husband killing himself in a dream symbolizes his falling into trouble and misfortunes. Dreaming of a husband committing suicide indicates that he needs a helping hand from his wife to get rid of problems. Through this article we have presented many One of the interpretations that arose when we see suicide in a dream, which is considered one of the...

title: What is the interpretation of buying clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Buying clothes in a dream Clothes are one of the necessary things in a man’s life, as they are a jacket for his nakedness, and an ornament that he adorns himself with in front of everyone, and buying clothes is something that women care about more than men, and the dream of buying. Clothes carry many different interpretations depending on the type and gender of the dreamer, whether he is male or female, and whether he is married or single. Buying clothes in a dream. What is the interpretation of buying clothes in a dream? When a person dreams that he is shopping for new clothes, this is a sign that he will have a good travel opportunity. In which he achieves all his goals and ambitions. The dream of arranging modern clothes is a sign of good health, loss of anxiety, and positive development in the dreamer’s life. Whoever buys formal clothes, this indicates his activity, vitality, and abundant energy, and the vision also shows that he has many other abilities that he has not yet discovered. He says Some scholars say that a married man buys fashionable clothes as a symbol of travel. If he is an expatriate, it is a sign of returning home and settling down. If he is currently looking for an opportunity to travel, the dream suggests that he has left his homeland and semi-exile to fulfill his desires and expand his standard of living. To see in a dream that a gift of new clothes from another person means hiding flaws, but as for whoever sees that he is gifted with a new dress from a person he loves very much, it will be good. The time for an official engagement with a lover means catching up. A dream about buying a rich man’s clothing indicates a rise in status, while a scholar’s ​​clothing indicates an increase in knowledge and learning if the dreamer is qualified for that. Being in the clothing market and buying green clothes is a sign of obedience to God Almighty and the dreamer’s closeness. From his Lord, because green is the color of the clothes of the people of Paradise, or is it good. An omen to obtain a large inheritance soon. Whoever sees himself inside a clothing store and wearing red clothes is an undesirable sign of quarrels and murder, while buying embroidered clothes indicates fame, influence and power. What is the interpretation of buying clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin? According to the interpretation of the venerable sheikh Ibn Sirin, Watching a dream about buying clothes indicates working in a new job, from which the dreamer will earn a lot of money and be promoted to the highest rank. If the clothes are used or dirty, it is a symbol of hearing sad news and bad news in the coming days. If someone gives new clothes to someone, this is evidence of a lot of money and great livelihood that he will receive in the future, while the person who comes to him is dead and gives him A used piece of personal clothing is an undesirable sign that he is suffering from serious health problems. If a young man sees himself buying a new dress, the vision indicates that his marriage to a good girl is approaching and may mean achieving the goals and hopes that he has always wanted to achieve. Buying summer clothes in Winter is news of a change in circumstances for the better and a sign of good changes that will affect the dreamer's life in general and may also indicate prosperity and well-being in life. Buying winter clothes in the summer is evidence of goodness, grace and benefits of...
